segments.text: All except the back door . I left that open for Tim . He took the dog for a walk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I ’ m going on to bed . I ’ m beat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , I ’ m going to stay up awhile . I ’ Ve got to go over the household budget , We ‘ re a little over-spend this month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please told Tim to close the door to the basement . I don ’ t want dog down there tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , Good night , see you at breakfast .
segments.speaker: S2
